00022 #ifndef HYPERSPACE_CLIENTCONNECTIONHANDLER_H

00030 #include "AsyncComm/DispatchHandler.h"
00031 
00032 using namespace Hypertable;
00033 
00034 namespace Hyperspace {
00035 
00036   class Session;
00037 
00038   class ClientConnectionHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00039   public:
00040 
00041     enum { DISCONNECTED, CONNECTING, HANDSHAKING, CONNECTED };
00042 
00043     ClientConnectionHandler(Comm *comm, Session *session, time_t timeout);
00044     virtual ~ClientConnectionHandler();
00045 
00046     virtual void handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &eventPtr);
00047 
00048     void set_session_id(uint64_t id) { m_session_id = id; }
00049 
00050     bool disconnected() { 
00051       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00052       return m_state == DISCONNECTED;
00053     }
00054 
00055     int initiate_connection(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00056       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00057       DispatchHandlerPtr dhp(this);
00058       int error;
00059       m_state = CONNECTING;
00060       if ((error = m_comm->connect(addr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00061         std::string str;
00062         HT_ERRORF("Problem establishing TCP connection with Hyperspace.Master at %s - %s",
00063                      InetAddr::string_format(str, addr), Error::get_text(error));
00064         m_comm->close_socket(addr);
00065         m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00066       }
00067       return error;
00068     }
00069 
00070     void set_verbose_mode(bool verbose) { m_verbose = verbose; }
00071 
00072     void close() {
00073       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00074       m_comm->close_socket(m_master_addr);
00075       m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00076     }
00077 
00078   private:
00079     boost::mutex m_mutex;
00080     Comm *m_comm;
00081     Session *m_session;
00082     uint64_t m_session_id;
00083     int m_state;
00084     bool m_verbose;
00085     struct sockaddr_in m_master_addr;
00086     time_t m_timeout;
00087   };
00088   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ClientConnectionHandler> ClientConnectionHandlerPtr;
00089   
00090 
00091 }
